tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Reader should feel one step ahead or behind characters

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Alternating between slow builds and sharp action
No scene should feel like wasted time
Quick cuts and perspective shifts for tension

dialogue_style.title: Dialogue Style
content: Characters may lie, omit, or manipulate
Urgency in speech patterns when appropriate
Subtext about what characters truly know or want

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Begin with a hook or question
Use dramatic irony (reader knows something characters don't)
End scenes on unresolved tension or revelation

descriptive_focus.title: Descriptive Focus
content: Physical manifestations of stress and fear

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't let tension dissipate without payoff
Don't reveal information too early or too late
Resist making characters act stupidly for plot
